init the storage
```
mkdir -p ~/.alice
ssclient create -k ~/.alice/sm-key.pem -s ~/.alice/sm-data.json
```


ensure the key-generation sessions one,two,three are cancelled
```
target/release/alice dkg csi-rashi -c ed25519 -k one cancel
target/release/alice dkg csi-rashi -c ed25519 -k two cancel
target/release/alice dkg csi-rashi -c ed25519 -k three cancel
```



```shell
target/release/alice dkg csi-rashi -c ed25519 -k one deal -t 2 -x bc4bb29ce739b5d97007946aa4fdb987012c647b506732f11653c5059631cd00 <<EOF
191fb5fc4a9bf2ded9a09a0a2c4eb3eb90f15ee96deb1eec1a970df0a79d0900
a3b9a39c707177f10d440c071303df8beff535c40c7c25e92da187b14aac1200
EOF
```

```
191fb5fc4a9bf2ded9a09a0a2c4eb3eb90f15ee96deb1eec1a970df0a79d0900:0aa86c513dfd9e79cfe20ccbe6c44a25a88825c6d8c6d3277144e2ee5877f00a:f9aa08a9fc3d4152623634eb197dc5403e2da886e34ee19e801579fedb2bfc3e fa38876a13c46c3f888b6920464ae3543090b517e6745d5b3e13d6da838ff7ec

```
